## Quiz 07 - Making choices

1\) Given the equivalent Python or R code below, fill in the missing information on the diagram below.

```{python, eval=FALSE}
if num > 10:
  print('high')
else:
  print('low')
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
if(num>10){
  print('high')
}else{
  print('low')
}
```

2\) Given the equivalent Python or R code below, what will be returned to the console?

```{python, eval=FALSE}
x=0
if x < 0:
  print('negative')
elif x > 0:
  print('positive')
else:
  print('zero')
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
x=0
if(x<0){
  print('negative')
}else if(x>0){
  print('positive')
}else{
  print('zero')
}
```
